meanings.definition: a series of exercises designed to strengthen the abdominal muscles.
meanings.sent1: Doing crunches helps make your tummy stronger.
meanings.sent2: She does crunches every morning to work on her abs.
meanings.sent3: The little boy giggled as he tried to do crunches like his dad.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to do crunches every day is as solid as a rock.
meanings.sent5: The image of doing crunches on the beach stayed in her mind.

meanings.definition: the act of making a crunching sound.
meanings.sent1: The crunches of leaves underfoot signaled the arrival of autumn.
meanings.sent2: The crunches of the gravel beneath the car tires echoed in the quiet street.
meanings.sent3: The crunches of the chips in his mouth made her laugh.
meanings.sent4: The crunches of the snow under his boots sounded like music to his ears.
meanings.sent5: The crunches of the dry twigs in the fire filled the forest with crackling sounds.

meanings.definition: a type of snack food made from crisped rice or corn.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed the sweet crunches of the rice snacks.
meanings.sent2: The kids love to munch on the crunchy crunches after school.
meanings.sent3: The loud crunches of the corn chips could be heard across the room.
meanings.sent4: The satisfying crunches of the cereal made breakfast enjoyable.
meanings.sent5: The delicious crunches of the snack filled the room with a tempting aroma.
